title: 70s Movie Poster Font??? HELP
content:
Does anyone know this font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20101110103202/http:/typophile.com/files/type_35.jpg) | 65.56 KB |
author: C Ray

comments.content:
I bet its a custom face but I've been wrong before.  
Try Tank Regular.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/tank/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101110103202/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/tank/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/tank/regular/")

Good luck

evan  
 [www.evanmade.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20101110103202/http:/evanmade.com/)

It's ATF Othello (not to be confused with Monotype's Othello, which is a whole different face). I don't believe there's a digital version currently available. [Futura Display](http://web.archive.org/web/20101110103202/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/futura-display/) is not dissimilar.
